title: 45 Luxury Gifts For Men Who Appreciate The Finer Things
description: Even the guy who has everything will be impressed.

html:
Best Decanter

Riedel Ultra Decanter

That special bottle he’s been saving for the holidays deserves to be displayed and shared in this decadent decanter.

Best Griddle

Camp Chef Gridiron 36 Pro Bundle

Spoil your backyard chef with the ULTIMATE outdoor kitchen addition. It’s the gift that keeps on giving!

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Leather Jacket

Buck Mason Bruiser PCH Jacket

Buck Mason’s black leather rider jacket has a retro fit that’s hard to beat. Despite its subtle shine, the sheepskin has a lived-in feel, and with its seams reinforced at stress points, it’s built to last. TLDR: It’ll wear nicely and serve as a classic transition-weather topper.

Best Fragrance

Dior4 Sauvage Elixir Eau de Parfum

Dior Sauvage is one of the most popular colognes, and the spicy scent’s Elixir expression is perfect for autumn and winter. An ultra-concentrated blend of ingredients creates a fragrance that’s practically irresistible, with notes of lavender, licorice, and ambery woods.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Gloves

Burberry Bias Check Cashmere Knit Gloves

Bulky ski gloves won’t cut it when he’s commuting to work, sightseeing, or hitting the town. This Burberry pair is made from a brushed cashmere blend and features a fresh take on the brand’s classic checkered print. They’re incredibly soft, warm, and anything but cumbersome.

Best Wine

Wine by Lamborghini Limited: Luxe Collection Masterpiece Edition

From its shiny packaging to its smooth blends, everything about Wine by Lamborghini is luxurious. Aged in French oak at the car founder’s family-run vineyard near Umbria, this set of four bottles is guaranteed to be the showpiece of his bar while it lasts. It is, quite literally, the Lambo of the vino world, after all.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Sweater

Naadam Super Luxe Cashmere Cable Crewneck

A classic sweater never misses. Made from extra-thick cashmere, this cable-knit crewneck from Naadam has a relaxed fit and ribbed details that will keep him cozy but looking fresh. Since it can easily be dressed up or down, it’s sure to become his winter staple.

Best Bag

Prada Leather Shoulder Bag

Bags for men are the new normal, whether they’re for travel or day-to-day errands. A Prada crossbody is the perfect intro into this world. With its structured leather silhouette, it’s low-profile and sleek.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Trudon Gloria 5-Wick Candle, 2.8 kg

This Trudon candle is big, OK? Like, impressively huge. The five-wick, 24-carat gold leaf-plated vessel has over 300 hours of burn time. That means he’ll get to enjoy its firewood scent—with notes of patchouli, cedarwood, cinnamon, and nutmeg—all winter long, at the very least.

Best Drinkware

Baccarat Four Elements Double Old-Fashioneds, Set of 4

In the crystal realm, nothing says luxury quite like Baccarat. This sophisticated set of four mismatched tumblers is inspired by the elements (air, water, fire, and earth), and it’s sure to jazz up any bar cart. He’ll feel downright regal as he sips his go-to cocktail.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Most Unique Splurge

MATEO Lighter Holder Logo-Cutout Rhodium-Plated Pendant Necklace

We love nothing more than a prestigious take on something random, and this necklace is, by all accounts, a work of art. Sure, a lighter holder strung on a paperclip chain might seem like a novelty gift, but it’s actually quite functional. And with glossy rhodium-plated silver that catches the light, it’s certainly a conversation piece.

Best Hoodie

Ralph Lauren Purple Label Polo Bear Fleece Hoodie

A hoodie inspired by evening wear? Loungewear doesn’t get any more lavish. He’ll feel dressed to the nines in this cotton-blend sweatshirt from Ralph Lauren; on its front, the iconic Polo Bear sports a tuxedo that’s actually made from the brand's luxurious Purple Label fabrics.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Wallet

Loro Piana Logo-Debossed Full-Grain Leather Billfold Wallet

If his current wallet has seen better days, this classic billfold from Loro Piana will be a considerable upgrade. Made from durable full-grain leather, it has a roomy interior despite its compact size. Whether you choose brown or black, you can’t go wrong.

Best Body Care

Byredo Byredo Le Corps Gypsy Water Body Wash and Body Lotion Gift Set, 2 x 7.6 oz.

This skincare set from Byredo will easily elevate his everyday shower experience. It includes the brand’s rejuvenating body wash and shea butter-infused lotion in the popular Gypsy Water scent, with notes of bergamot, lemon, pepper, and sandalwood. He’ll feel (and smell) fresher than ever.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Timepiece

TAG Heuer Connected Calibre E4 Golf Edition Smartwatch, 42mm

What appears to be an analog timepiece actually has smart capabilities. The band gives a sporty aesthetic without looking too techy. It’s sleek and chic and will track his activity, heart rate, and more, making it a sweet blend of luxury and performance.

Best Watch Box

WOLF Earth 5-Piece Watch Box with Storage

If his watch game is already strong, he’ll be thrilled to score this fancy storage case. Not only will he be able to store five of his favorite timepieces inside the faux leather lock-and-key box, but he can also stash other valuables in the removable tray’s compartments. There’s also a separate zip case, which he can take on any travels.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Warmest Jacket

Canada Goose Wyndham Parka

No one does outerwear quite like Canada Goose. The Wyndham Parka is meant to withstand extreme elements. It has an arctic tech shell that will stay dry while providing 625-fill of down insulation. Translation? This coat is worth the splurge.

Celine Homme CT-04 Leather Sneakers

In the sneaker realm, stealth wealth still reigns supreme. These all-white, lush leather low-tops from Celine are a major flex. He’ll be casually dressed, but very much dressed to impress whenever he wears them.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Scarf

Loewe Scarf in Cashmere

Scarf season is upon us! Upgrade his outerwear with an understated cashmere moment from Loewe. It’s soft and cozy like a blanket, and because its neutral hue goes with everything, it’s a worthy investment.

Fear of God Fleece Relaxed Shorts

Any self-proclaimed streetwear king will be pleased to receive these fleece shorts from Fear of God. They’re precisely the type of gift that he might not think to buy himself but would become his new loungewear obsession. Much like that tattered pair of basketball shorts he refuses to throw out, these also happen to be machine washable. So now he’ll have no excuse.

Vanessa is an established editor, stylist and shopping expert covering all things style, gear and wellness. She lives in Los Angeles and is passionate about sharing innovative products, tips and trends for people and the planet.

Samantha Simon is a writer, editor, and pop culture enthusiast living in New York City. She previously served as Features Editor at InStyle. If she’s not in the middle of a Law & Order: SVU marathon, she’s probably on a 4-mile walk with her Cavalier King Charles Spaniel, Dexter (named after the fictional vigilante serial killer, naturally), shopping, or searching for the best cacio e pepe that the city has to offer. Her favorite topics include celebrity memoirs, emo bands of the early aughts, and the weekly Sakara Life menu.
